fields.description:
Description:

KitchenSink crashes while trying to open single photo in Photo gallery. It happens during testing KitchenSink on on LG VS910 4G (2.3.6).

Steps:

1. Run Refactored KitchenSink
2. In "Phone" module press on "Photo Gallery".
3. Click on photo album.
4. Click on any single photo.

Expected results:

Should be able to open single photo.

Actual results:

Application crashes.

Note:
Similar behavior observed in Phone > Contacts > Contacts Picker. After clicking on the single picker app crashes.
fields.summary: KitchenSink: KitchenSink crashes while trying to open single photo in Photo gallery
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.1.201207271312
Titanium SDK, build: 2.1.1.v20120727140110
Device: LG VS910 4G (2.3.6)

comments.body: As in KitchenSink of 07.31.2012 it is possible to open single photo in "Photo gallery" and  in "Contacts Picker" it is possible to see selected picker's name.

Cannot Reproduce on the Latest build of KitchenSink (08.01.12)

Tested on HTC Sensation 4G running 2.3.4
Tested on LG Revolution  4G running 2.3.6

Closed because can not reproduce with the latest build.
08.02.2012.
